Iron Fork Short Order Awards 2010 Nominees Are In... Vote Now! By Jose D. Duran Wed., Sep. 15 2010 at 12:38 PM Categories: Iron Fork Pin It
​ Last month, we revealed that at this year's Iron Fork event on October 21 we'd be handing out our first ever Short Order awards. While Best of Miami is picked by an ominous "editorial board," the blog awards work a little differently. We asked a group of local chefs, food bloggers, and our own Short Order writers to send in nominees in six categories: Besf Chef, Best Up&Coming Chef, Best Pastry Chef, Best Restaurant, Best Mixologist, and Best Plate.
Now that the nominees are in, it's time for you, the reader, to help us pick the winner. All you have to do is visit newtimesshortorder.com to cast your vote. Simple as that!
Winners will be announced October 21 at Iron Fork -- tickets on sale now. Also, check back because we might start feeling generous and hand out a few Iron Fork prize packages.
Want to know who made the cut before voting? Check the full list of nominees after the jump.
Best Chef Michelle Bernstein (Michy's, Sra. Martinez) Michael Schwartz (Michael's Genuine Food&Drink) Philippe Ruiz (Palme d'Or) Allen Susser (Chef Allen's) Norman Van Aken (Norman's 180) Dewey LoSasso (The Forge) Pascal Oudin (Pascal's on Ponce) Kevin Cory (NAOE Miami) Douglas Rodriguez (Douglas Rodriguez Restaurant Group) Marc Vidal (Solea)
Best Up&Coming Chef Timon Balloo (Sugarcane Raw Bar Grill) Jeff O'Neill (The Villa) Simon Stojanovic (Altamare) Brandon Whitestone (Chef Allen's) Jeremiah Bullfrog (Gastropod, Bullfrog Eatz)
Best Pastry Chef Hedy Goldsmith (Michael's Genuine Food&Drink) Malka Espinel (The Forge) Oliver Rodriguez (Palme d'Or) Julian Philippe (Zuma) Vanessa Paz (Michy's)
Best Restaurant Palme d'Or Michael's Genuine Food&Drink Hakkasan Eos Naoe Sugarcane Raw Bar Grill Zuma
Best Mixologist Robert Ortenzio (Sra. Martinez, Meat Market) Jay Wolmer (Select Brands) Camille Austin (Hakkasan) Elad Zvi (Living Room at the W South Beach) Ally Plotkin (Mercadito) David Ortiz (Club 50)
Best Plate NAOE Bento Box Lechon asado at El Palacio de los Jugos Lobster PB&J at The Forge Roast chicken, truffle potatoes at Sugarcane Smoked octopus salad at Eos Pork buns at Sakaya Kitchen
